nodes.bodyText:
Nit (multiple occurrences in this class): Can we

Move the hardcoded TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(30) value to some static variable?
Update the comments such as Check in 30 seconds to see... to avoid mentioning hardcoded times and refer to the static variable?
I used {@value HALF_MINUTE_IN_MS} to replace 30 seconds in comments
(Not introduced in this patch): Can we rename this private variable to SAMPLING_INTERVAL_MS?

Nit: For variables in this package, we use the following naming convention:
<config>_CONFIG
DEAFULT_<config>
<config>_DOC

Adding this suffix only to the default value violates this convention.
Can we either (1) apply the same suffix to the METADATA_MAX_AGE_CONFIG and METADATA_MAX_AGE_DOC or (2) rollback the name change?
I changed METADATA_MAX_AGE_CONFIG to METADATA_MAX_AGE_MS_CONFIG and METADATA_MAX_AGE_DOC to METADATA_MAX_AGE_MS_DOC
